snippet: Many of those arrested at a market in St. Petersburg were migrants from Central Asia and the mainly Muslim North Caucasus.
abstract: Russian authorities raid St Petersburg market and detain 378 people, many of them migrants from Central Asia and Muslim North Caucasus region, following melee at market gates that left one man dead of knife wound; Sennoy market, popular hub for migrant workers, has become frequent target for immigration raids by police.
lead_paragraph: Many of those arrested at a market in St. Petersburg were migrants from Central Asia and the mainly Muslim North Caucasus.

headline.seo: Hundreds Detained in Immigration Raid in Russia
headline.main: Nearly 400 People Detained in Immigration Raid in Russia
headline.print_headline: Russia: Nearly 400 Are Detained in Immigration Raid
